p: To 300 μL of the previous extracts, 300 μL of pure benzene were added and the resulting solution incubated with agitation at 0 °C bath for 30 min. It was then centrifuged at 4.500 g for 20 min at 4 °C in a Beckman J2-21M/E centrifuge. To the recovered supernatant 500 μL of 10% (v/v) ammonia solution were added and the absorbance read at 515 nm using Aloe blue curacao aloin as a standard [ 27].
